Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28232248]Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV):inhibition of JEV infection in BHK-21 (baby hamster kidney) cells (IC50=7.66 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Peptide derived from protein E stem may inhibit virus infection by blocking virus entry.

Literature.Title: Antiviral activity of peptide inhibitors derived from the protein E stem against Japanese encephalitis and Zika viruses.
Literature.Author: Chen L, Liu Y, Wang S, Sun J, Wang P, Xin Q, Zhang L, Xiao G, Wang W.
